synopsis.text:
This thrilling anime follows the intrepid quartet of Sanzo, Goku, Gojyo, and Hakkai on a perilous journey westward to thwart the malevolent schemes of the formidable demon Gyumaoh. Along the way, they encounter a mysterious girl in distress, and in a chivalrous act, they come to her aid, fending off a colossal bird. As a token of appreciation, the girl extends an invitation to her opulent mansion, an offer the weary travelers readily accept.

However, the mansion is not as it seems, and the group soon finds themselves entangled in a sinister plot of revenge, betrayal, and life-threatening games orchestrated by the mansion's enigmatic master. With shikigami and doppelg√§ngers at play, the group must navigate this treacherous game, all while grappling with revelations about Sanzo's haunted past and a young boy harboring a decades-old grudge. Will our heroes survive this unexpected turn of events, or will they fall victim to the master's cunning machinations? Join them in this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
